name: BirdWatch Ireland
goal: Survey, monitoring, conservation and advocacy of wild birds, their habitats and wider biodiversity in Ireland. BirdWatch ireland also undertakes research, education and awareness raising events with schools and the general public.
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives: Biodiversity, Environment, Agriculture, Fisheries, Climate and Energy. Specifically CFP, CAP, Nature Directives, European Semester processes
